text: Dasylophia is a genus of moths of the family Notodontidae first described by Alpheus Spring Packard in 1864. ==Species== *Dasylophia anguina (J. E. Smith, 1797) *Dasylophia lucia Schaus, 1901 *Dasylophia lupia (Druce, 1887) *Dasylophia seriata (Druce, 1887) *Dasylophia thyatiroides (Walker, 1862) ==References== Category:Notodontidae
title: Dasylophia
